Room.Description: top of a tall cypress tree
damp hollow stump in the swamp
semi-dark hole by the root chamber
*I'm on the shore of a lake
*I'm at the bottom of a very deep chasm. High above me is a pair of ledges. One has a bricked up window across its face the other faces a Throne-room
*I'm on a narrow ledge by a chasm. Across the chasm is the Throne-room
*I'm on a narrow ledge by a Throne-room Across the chasm is another ledge
*I think I'm in real trouble now. There's a fellow here with a pitchfork and pointed tail. ...Oh Hell!
Memory chip of a COMPUTER! I took a wrong turn!
top of an oak. To the East I see a meadow, beyond that a lake.
*I'm at the edge of a BOTTOMLESS hole
*I'm on a ledge just below the rim of the BOTTOMLESS hole. I don't think I want to go down
long tunnel. I hear buzzing ahead
large misty room with strange unreadable letters over all the exits.

Messages.Message: BOY that really hit the spot!
Dragon smells something. Awakens & attacks me!
TIMBER. Something fell from the tree top & vanished in the swamp
Lamp burns with a cold flameless blue glow.
My chigger bites are now INFECTED!
My bites have rotted my whole body!
Bear eats the honey and falls asleep.
First I need an empty container.
The bees all suffocated and disappeared
gas needs to be contained before it will burn
Gas dissipates. (I think you blew it)
`Don't waste honey, get mad instead! Dam lava!?`
Bees madden bear, bear then attacks me!
In 2 words tell me at what...like: AT TREE
Mirror hits floor and shatters into a MILLION pieces
Mirror lands softly on rug, lights up and says:
I'm not carrying ax, take inventory!
It doesn't seem to bother him at all!
The mud dried up and fell off.
Bear is so startled that he FELL off the ledge!
` DRAGON STING ` and fades. I don't get it, I hope you do.
The bees attack the dragon which gets so annoyed it gets up and flys away...
There's something there all right! Maybe I should go there?
A glowing Genie appears, drops somehting, then vanishes.
A glowing Genie appears, says `Boy you're selfish`, takes something and then makes `ME` vanish!
Try --> `LOOK, JUMP, SWIM, CLIMB, FIND, TAKE, SCORE, DROP` and any other verbs you can think of...
There are only 3 ways to wake the Dragon!
Read the sign in the meadow!
You may need to say magic words here
Sorry, I can only throw the ax.
I don't know where it is

Welcome to Adventure number: 1 `ADVENTURELAND`. In this Adventure you're to find *TREASURES* & store them away.
To see how well you're doing say: `SCORE`
Fish have escaped back to the lake.
Check with your favorite computer dealer for the next Adventure program: PIRATE ADVENTURE. If they don't carry `ADVENTURE` have them call: 1-305-862-6917 today!

Item.Description: Spider web with writing on it
-HOLLOW- stump and remains of a felled tree
Open door with a hallway beyond
Sign: `magic word's AWAY! Look la...` (Rest of sign is missing!)
Sign here says `In many cases mud is good. In others...`
Bricked up window with a hole in it
Strange scratchings on rock says: `ALADIN was here`
Sign says `LIMBO. Find right exit and live again!`
Smoking hole. pieces of dragon and gore.
Sign here says `Opposite of LIGHT is UNLIGHT`
